remarks: If there are three (different) vertices in a graph which are mutually connected by edges, there is a 3-cycle in the graph.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 14-Nov-2017.)
statement:
3v3e3cycl2 $p |- ( V USGrph E -> ( E. a e. V E. b e. V E. c e. V ( { a , b } e. ran E /\ { b , c } e. ran E /\ { c , a } e. ran E ) -> E. f E. p ( f ( V Cycles E ) p /\ ( # ` f ) = 3 ) ) ) $.
$d E a b c f p $.
$d V a b c f p $.
